version_description:
- A revolutionary anti-blocking solution specially designed for users in United Emirates and China.
- A dozen of performance improvements which bring you a superfast and smooth browsing experience.

3.2.6
- Fixed crashes on tapping Connect button.

3.2.5
- A revolutionary anti-blocking solution specially designed for users in United Emirates and China.
- A dozen of performance improvements which bring you a superfast and smooth browsing experience.
Minor improvements

- Good news for Rio Olympics fans: We have new servers/locations for streaming the Rio Olympic games
- A minor crash on iOS-8 is fixed,
- A bunch of performance improvements,

3.2.9
- The crash on start is fixed.

3.2.8
- Good news for Rio Olympics fans: We have new servers/locations for streaming the Rio Olympic games
- A minor crash on iOS-8 is fixed,
- A bunch of performance improvements
Bug fixes.
Now, our cute Betternet guy will intelligently choose the best possible protocol to provide you the best experience ever.
Bug fixes
Improvements in connection speed and UI.
Bug fixes

- Improvements in Location page UI
- Bug fixes
Crash fixes
Crash fixes.

Connect to even more virtual locations with our new list of global servers!
Now with over 80+ virtual locations, you can securely access all your favorite apps and websites from anywhere in the world.

Hello folks,
We made a few bug fixes and improvements, so you can enjoy your favorite VPN.

Hello folks,
We made a few bug fixes and improvements, so you can enjoy your favorite VPN.

New feature "Unsecured Wi-Fi added" - it will notify you when you connected to an unsecured Wi-Fi network. 
Thanks for your feedback and features requests, we always want to make Betternet better!
- improvements and bug fixes.
- improvements and bug fixes.

Black Friday is here! 
Enjoy an extra 25% off the premium VPN annual plan! Now it's only $71.99 instead of $95.99! 

New Connection Rating!
We are aiming to deliver the best user experience and you can help us to make Betternet the best VPN! After the disconnect, rate the connection from 1 to 5 stars and answer a few more questions, it will help us to understand problems and improve the service. 

Some minor bugs were fixed and we made some improvements.
- Bugfixes and improvement.

#Fixes 
- Some bug fixes here and there

If you like Betternet VPN, please spend a few moments to leave us a review. It will help Betternet VPN get noticed and help more people be more secured.

Fixes

Hey folks, 

- We updated our customer support flow, now you can contact support in the app, instead of sending the email to the support team. 
- Some bugs were fixed

Thanks for using our product and please rate us in App Store!

With this release we are introducing Auto-Protected mode. Now, you can setup Betternet in a way it will be automatically connecting you to the VPN when you join insecure Wi-Fi networks. You can also enable "Always On" mode to get maximum protection.
